description:
For nearly four decades, health care professionals throughout the country have understood that they have a reliable and experienced ally in the Chapman Law Group. Based in Troy, Michigan, Chapman Law Group is a boutique firm with a national reputation. Its seasoned attorneys focus on the health care industry, representing hundreds of medical professionals including physicians, pharmacists and nurses. Chapman Law Group helps clients confront legal challenges related to health care compliance, regulatory issues and criminal defense.

Founded in 1985 by Ronald W. Chapman Sr., the law firm has guided countless health care professionals. Whether starting your health care career, growing your health care practice or pharmacy or planning to retire, the attorneys at Chapman Law Group are prepared. Its team listens, provides insight, and leads you through any challenges. Chapman Law Group's attorneys include licensed physicians and nurses who understand the intricacies of your profession.

Your commitment and effort in becoming a licensed health professional does not go unnoticed by this team of attorneys. Chapman Law Group also understands the challenges and issues you face, remaining dedicated to protecting and defending your license, reputation, and livelihood.

The law firm's practice areas include:

• Healthcare law
• Healthcare compliance
• Healthcare fraud and healthcare-based criminal defense
• Healthcare provider licensing defense
• Regulatory compliance
• Healthcare audit defense
• HIPAA compliance, breach, and violations defense
• Professional liability and malpractice defense
• Healthcare corporate transactions and business matters

The clients of Chapman Law Group gain extra reassurance in other important ways as well. For example, a number of the firm's attorneys obtained a Master of Law degree in health law from Loyola University Chicago School of Law. The institution is among the country's top-ranked schools for health law studies.

Also, its team of attorneys includes three people recognized by their peers as among the best. Firm founder Ronald W. Chapman Sr. made the Super Lawyers list four times, most recently in 2021. Making the Rising Stars list were Ronald W. Chapman II for six consecutive years from 2015 through 2020, and Wedad Suleiman in 2021.

Besides its Michigan headquarters, Chapman Law Group has three other attorney offices: two Florida locations in Sarasota and Miami, and a West Coast office in North Hollywood, California, Chapman Law Group also provides legal advice in estate planning and probate matters as well as general litigation.
